History

Lastation is one of the four primary countries which comprise Gamindustri. It appears dirty and dreary at first glance, but beneath its somewhat rough exterior lies a nation at the forefront of technology and high standards of living. Billed as the country that "does everything," it is home to more independent manufacturing companies than any other nation; a fact that nearly cost Black Heart all of her Shares when Avenir Manufacturing attempted a hostile takeover under the guidance of Arfoire. Its proximity to Planeptune has led to large amounts of trade and cultural exchange between the two nations, and perhaps a bit of a closer relationship between the two nations' CPUs and Candidates than most others. Despite this, however, it is functionally most similar to, and competes most directly with, Leanbox.

Most refined and gracious Lady Black Heart, we thank our fates for your guidance and protection! Truly are you the CPU with the strongest ruling hand, who seemingly never rests a moment as she turns Lastation into the envy of all Gamindustri. Under your rule, Lastation has become a technological juggernaut - the foremost nation in Gamindustri, in fact. And yet still you persevere in enacting reforms, organizing public works projects, and personally protecting the citizens from monster attacks. In fact, you are so focused on your work that you seem to be completely lacking in personal companionship! ...my sincerest apologies, that was very out of line for me to say![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Immaculate Black Heart of Lastation, truly have you earned the title of "The CPU Who Does Everything!" Surely greatness awaits Lastation once more, and under your command, it will come sooner rather than later. Can you dominate Gamindustri with your technological marvels? Can you exert Lastation's dominion over the whole planet? Can you build a Civilization that can stand the test of time? Can you make one single friend with that tsundere barrier you erect on a regular basis? ...yes, I think I will quit speaking now, it DOES sound like that would be good for my health.

History

Noire, better known to the general populace as Lady Black Heart, is the CPU of Lastation. A tsundere through and through. However, amongst the 4 CPUs, she is the one with the strongest work ethic and, arguably, the only one of them who actually takes her duties as seriously as she should. She has a low tolerance for failure and laziness, making it that much more amazing that Neptune has gotten so close to her. Unbeknownst to the public, she is also heavily into cosplay.

Black Heart's Beauty
Armas Infantry

The Armas is a weapon developed by the independent blacksmith Chian, a resident of Lastation. In the Superdimension, her assistance was vital to helping Noire, Neptune, and their friends destroy the iron grip that Avenir held over Lastation. The weapon is capable of recording data from its battles. This data is used to improve the weapon's performance.

Unique Longswordsman replacement for Lastation. Earns 75% more XP from combat. The highest Experience Level earned amongst Armas Infantry grants all Armas Infantry +5% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength and +1 Healing, up to a maximum of +25%/+5 if one reaches level 6. This bonus is preserved upon upgrading, but after upgrading, it will not receive any future bonuses accrued from other Armas Infantries. Obsoletes at Rifling and upgrades directly to a Rifleman.

The Armas Infantry is the Unique Unit for Lastation, replacing the Longswordsman. Reaching new Levels with an Armas Infantry not only boosts that particular Unit's power, but that of all other Armas Infantry in your empire! To further this end, it receives Experience at a faster rate. The bonus from earning levels persists upon upgrading the unit, but it will not receive any future upgrades you may earn. For example, if you have an Armas Infantry reach level 4, have another Armas Infantry upgrade to a Rifleman, and then have the aforementioned Armas Infantry reach level 5, the Rifleman will only ever keep the bonus from level 4. Do your best to get as much experience as possible with these units before they obsolete!

Cosplay Shop

Noire's cosplay habit is a secret known only to a very select few, and she prefers to keep it that way. When asked if the numerous costume shops around Lastation are being publicly subsidized, she will generally not deny it, but she will vehemently object to any inquiries about her own interest in them. But still, rumors travel fast. Stories frequently pop up that Noire has attended conventions in full costume. None of these stories have been verified. They are generally found to be false due to the fact that the cosplayer is wearing a pair of glasses, which Noire would never do. Right?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Tabloid material aside, Lastation's lavish cosplays found at conventions are a major draw to the nation, and Noire seems to have a habit of hosting conventions whenever big world events occur in her city...

Develop Cell Architecture

One of your foremost architects has discussed the idea of making Lastation's buildings utilize what they have described as Cell Architecture. This revolutionary style emphasizes fashioning buildings in a way which seems to merge with all of its adjacent buildings, almost like they were all miniature cores of one central core building. Caught Cosplaying!

You're typically pretty good at keeping your identity secret when you're out cosplaying at conventions. Who knew all it usually takes is a pair of glasses? But this time, someone actually saw through your disguise and identified you as the CPU of Lastation! If this gets out, word of your most embarassing hobby will spread like wildfire![NEWLINE]

Avenir Gains Support

Ever since Lastation began industrializing, a company by the name of Avenir has begun gaining popular support. It appears they are trying to collect Lastation's Shares for themselves! This can't be allowed to continue. You've heard they are actually militarized and possess many powerful armored weapons...but if that's the case, then they just might have to put them to the test against your military![NEWLINE]
Let's not make this overly hostile. I'll just work harder to maintain our Shares.
